mapper.select:
SELECT USER_SEQ AS userSeq , MACADDRESS AS macAddress , SUM(WATT) AS watt , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H') AS regDate , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%H') AS hour , GROUP_CONCAT( WATT SEPARATOR ';' ) AS wattList , GROUP_CONCAT( EVENT_TYPE SEPARATOR ';' ) AS eventList FROM TBL_LOG_INFO
DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()
GROUP BY regDate ORDER BY REG_DATE ASC
